topics.body:
Like I said on my tumblr.

I'm getting tired and sick of these terrible laws trying to get passed.

Its like whenever we get rid of One law next thing you know the government tries to push an _even_ shittier one.

"Hey remember that thing that you liked doing because its fun and harmless?"

"Yeah we're trying to push this law that makes that illegal for no reason bye" 

Can we not have to worry about a bill that will potentially put us in prison for something dumb please? 

First Sopa and now this.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b3d6c663687203c7000b4e#post_55b3d6c663687203c7000b4e
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b3d7856368720ff9000654#post_55b3d7856368720ff9000654
The TPP is basically SOPA 2.0 on crack, crystal meth and cocanium.


Call me crazy or such, but $5000 on the bill backfiring hard because the movie industry, comic book industry, console gaming industry, tv industry, cartoon industry, anime industry rely heavily on international trade to grow.

The TPP's copyright laws are so restrictive that it would cause a lot of people to stop putting money towards things.

This isn't even me saying this but major economists and renowned anime creators saying this but the most likely outcome of the TPP is Japan's economy might collapse because of how much they rely on trade with other countries and how popular international trade for anime dvds and that is.

The comic book hero boom going on might just outright die because the reason why avengers and that brings in so much money is that it's shown across the world.

I know I'm a pc fan, but hear me out; console gaming might just fucking outright die because Sony and Nintendo manufacture their consoles in Japan so if you want to buy it elsewhere you're looking at *MASSIVE* fucking price hike; say hello to a $1600 wiiu. . $1600 may be a bit of a exaggeration, but you get the point; I legitimately don't think consoles gaming platforms can survive such a huge price spike.  After TPP goes into effect your only options would be to either live in the country the console is manufactured, pay a huge fucking price if you live out of the country or pc cause that will more or less be unaffected.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b3dc10636872460c00049c#post_55b3dc10636872460c00049c
Call me a asshole, but I actually can't wait to see it fuck over the people who pushed it.

RIAA and Hollywood, "Woohoo!  This will finally stop piracy!"
*two weeks later*
"The tv and film industry is burning down!  Everything is horrible!"

When you get down to it the bill is so restrictive copyright wise that the people it's hurting the most is the copyright holders and those trying to sell media legitimately.
